overview:
Saverio Maresca is a Software Engineering manager at OcÃ© Display Graphics Systems (a Canon company) in Vancouver, Canada. The company designs and manufactures large format flatbed and roll-to-roll UV curable inkjet printers. The software group he manages is responsible for the embedded controller that manages both real-time and near real-time sub-systems, processes print jobs, and implements a rich user interface for the print operator.

Saverio graduated from the University of British Columbia with a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Engineering, and went on to work at Cymbolic Sciences International (a producer of laser film recorders), Quality Software Associates (a AV control software start-up in southern California), Sierra Wireless (a producer of embedded wireless modules for cellular networks), and most recently OcÃ© (a complete document systems solution provider).
